name: 陳潔晞
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
9/20 Introduction
9/27 Vocabulary (Level One) 1-100. Understand Vocabulary from Context; Referent
10/4 Vocabulary (Level One) 100-200. Simplify Meanings of Sentences
10/11 Vocabulary (Level Two) 201-250. Find Factual Information; Understand Negative Facts
10/18 Vocabulary (Level Two) 251-300. Makes Inferences from Stated Facts
10/25 Vocabulary (Level Two) 301-350 Select Summary Information
11/1 Holiday
11/8 Review; Vocabulary (Level Two) 351-400
11/15 Midterm
11/22 Vocabulary (Level Three) 401-450. Listening: Basic Comprehension
11/29 Vocabulary (Level Three) 451-500. Listening: Understand the Details.
12/6 Vocabulary (Level Three) 501-550. Listening: Understand the Function
12/13 Vocabulary (Level Three) 551-600. Listening: Understand the Speaker’s Stance
12/20 Vocabulary (Level Four) 601-650. Writing Overview: Main Points; Writing Plan
12/27 Vocabulary (Level Four) 651-700 Writing Paragraphs
1/3 Vocabulary (Level Four) 701-750 Writing: Sentence Structures
1/10 Review; Vocabulary (Level Four) 751-800
1/17 Final Exam
materials:
許章真。托福字會滿分 Bookman TOFEL Vocabulary.  台北：書林出版公司，2011年。
Phillips, Deborah.  Longman Preparation Course for the TOFEL Test.  NY: Longman, 2007.
